sentences: TGICA Co-Chair Richard Moss (US) outlined the problems posed by inadequate data in specific regions or sectors, and by the need for training and capacity building in developing countries.
He outlined TGICAs proposal to enhance capacity in developing nations, as contained in the TGICA Progress Report (IPCC-XXIV/Doc.
Delegates approved the proposal on the understanding that the TGICA will act as a facilitator but will not provide training.
